title: "Paul Ryan's my dad". (LIVE from Madison)
description: Erin Ryan, Randy "Iron Stache" Bryce, and Rep. Chris Taylor join Jon, Jon, Tommy, and Dan in Madison, Wisconsin to talk about gun safety, Tillerson calling Trump a moron, not draining the swamp, and much more.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
